content.question: In the third paragraph, the author discusses the role of asteroid strikes in mass extinctions primarily to

choices.label: challenge a generalization made by certain astronomers
suggest that volcanic eruptions are more destructive than asteroid strikes
explain why volcanic eruptions are more common than asteroid strikes
acknowledge the merits of a position that he rejects

content.answer: challenge a generalization made by certain astronomers

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
